name: Bless Me
description:
Made for the Miziziziz Game Jam 1, Bless Me is the second game I have ever completed.

This is an adventure game about growing up, and watching those you love grow up. The game is heavily story-based and contains no enemies or combat.

You play as Tony, an 8 year-old boy who stays with his Grandma every summer. Explore and learn about Tony's world by interacting with objects and reading what he has to say about them. There are 1-3 interact-able objects per scene, have fun finding them all!

This summer, when Tony visits, his Grandma immediately has something to ask of him. You will begin in her home, see what she has to say then begin your adventure!

In Honor of Rudolfo Anaya, author of the novel Bless Me, Ultima

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

Spacebar to interact

E to continue dialog
